params._lpToken: Address of the LP ERC-20 token.

params.calls: An array of inputs for each call.
params.revertOnFail: If True then reverts after a failed call and stops doing further calls.

params.pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

params.pids: Pool IDs of all to be updated. Make sure to update all active pools.

params._pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.
The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

params.direct: True if `newOwner` should be set immediately. False if `newOwner` needs to use `claimOwnership`.
params.renounce: Allows the `newOwner` to be `address(0)` if `direct` and `renounce` is True. Has no effect otherwise.

add(uint256,address,bool).notice: Add a new LP to the pool. Can only be called by the owner. DO NOT add the same LP token more than once. Rewards will be messed up if you do.

batch(bytes[],bool).notice: Allows batched call to self (this contract).

claimOwnership().notice: Needs to be called by `pendingOwner` to claim ownership.

emergencyWithdraw(uint256,address).notice: Withdraw without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY.

massUpdateSelectedPools(uint256[]).notice: Update reward variables for all pools. Be careful of gas spending!

pendingReward(uint256,address).notice: View function to see pending REWARD on frontend.

permitToken(address,address,address,uint.notice: Call wrapper that performs `ERC20.permit` on `token`. Lookup `IERC20.permit`.

set(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Update the given pool's REWARD allocation point. Can only be called by the owner.

transferOwnership(address,bool,bool).notice: Transfers ownership to `newOwner`. Either directly or claimable by the new pending owner. Can only be invoked by the current `owner`.
